main.headline: Survey for the first consultation
main.intro1: Dear patient, you would like to present yourself for counseling at an obesity center.
main.intro2: In order for the consultation to be as personalized and targeted as possible, it is helpful for us to obtain specific information about your personal details, accompanying conditions, medications, etc.
language.headline: Please choose a language
personalInfo.headline: Personal information
contactInfo.headline: Contact information
print.intro1: Please kindly click on the button below to print your queue number. With this number, you will be able to patiently await your turn.
print.intro2: We sincerely appreciate your cooperation and thank you for your participation.
